titleStmt.title: The Private Christians non vltra, or, A plea for the lay-man's interpreting the scriptures written by Philolaoclerus.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Francis, 1593-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hall ... for Tho. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Philolaoclerus is a pseudonym for Francis Osborne. cf. NUC pre-1956.
